Package org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.model.implementation

Class Expressions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.model.implementation.Expressions
  • public final class Expressions
extends Object
    This utilities class provides static methods for creating terms and formulas in vlog4j.
    Author:
    Markus Kr√∂tzsch

      • makeAtom

        public static Atom makeAtom​(String predicateName,
                            List<Term> terms)
        Creates an Atom.
        Parameters:
        predicateName - non-blank Predicate name
        terms - non-empty, non-null list of non-null terms
        Returns:
        an Atom with given terms and Predicate constructed from name given predicateName and arity given terms size.

        Creates an Atom.
        Parameters:
        predicateName - non-blank Predicate name
        terms - non-empty, non-null array of non-null terms
        Returns:
        an Atom with given terms and Predicate constructed from name given predicateName and arity given terms length.

      • makeAtom

        public static Atom makeAtom​(Predicate predicate,
                            List<Term> terms)
        Creates an Atom.
        Parameters:
        predicate - a non-null Predicate
        terms - non-empty, non-null list of non-null terms. List size must be the same as the given predicate arity.
        Returns:
        an Atom corresponding to the input.

        Parameters:
        predicate - a non-null Predicate
        terms - non-empty, non-null array of non-null terms. Aray size must be the same as the given predicate arity.
        Returns:
